scripts.clear:dist: git rm -r --cached dist && git commit -m "chore: remove dist from git tracking"
scripts.predeploy: git push origin --delete gh-pages || echo 'No existe la rama gh-pages, se crea nueva'
scripts.deploy: git add dist -f && git commit -m 'build: dist actualizado correctamente' && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.ghpages: yarn build && find dist -name .DS_Store -delete && yarn predeploy && yarn deploy
